statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 AND stock_level < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
DELETE FROM warehouse WHERE warehouse_id = 1001 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (SELECT id FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'Toy%');
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM inventory);
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 1001 AND stock_quantity <= 10
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity_ordered > 50
DELETE FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
